Header.title: AI Icon Generator
Header.description: Generate professional icons using AI DALL-E 3

HomePage.title: AI Icon Generator
HomePage.description: Generate professional icon designs using AI, supporting multiple styles and formats.

IconGenerator.errorDefault: Error generating icon, please try again later.
IconGenerator.rateLimitHourlyMessage: You have reached the hourly request limit. Please try again in {timeMessage}.
IconGenerator.rateLimitMinutelyMessage: You have reached the minutely request limit. Please try again in {timeMessage}.

PromptInput.label: Describe your icon
PromptInput.placeholder: Describe the icon you want, e.g., a minimalist blue cloud icon...

ExportOptions.title: Export Options
ExportOptions.infoBox: Images generated on different platforms may have varying retention times. Please download and save them locally as soon as possible. Expired image links will not be accessible.

toast.manualSave: Image opened in a new tab. Please save it manually.

error.noImage: No image to download. Please generate an image first.
error.invalidUrl: Invalid image URL format. Please regenerate the image.
error.timeout: Request timed out. Please try again.
